reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I use lots of tissues and these are worth the price.
reviews.reviewText: I'm buying them again for several reasons. I always have tissues in every room, and these seem to create far less lint, and they're sturdy, yet soft to the touch. I love the bright boxes without all the labels on them! Who wants advertising all over their products? Not me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Strong, and Reliable: Five Stars for These Amazing Facial Tissues!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a pack of facial tissues from Amazon, and I am thrilled to share my positive experience with these exceptional products. These facial tissues have quickly become a household staple, offering the perfect combination of softness, strength, and reliability. Here's why I wholeheartedly give them a resounding five-star rating:1. Gentle on the Skin: These facial tissues are incredibly soft and gentle, making them a pleasure to use. They are kind to delicate facial skin, ensuring a comfortable and soothing experience. Whether it's for wiping away tears, cleaning the face, or dealing with allergies, these tissues provide a gentle touch that prevents irritation and discomfort.2. Exceptional Strength and Durability: Despite their softness, these facial tissues boast impressive strength and durability. They are designed to withstand everyday use and are up to the task of handling various cleaning and wiping needs. From light touch-ups to more substantial cleanups, these tissues hold up well without tearing or falling apart.3. Reliable Absorbency: These facial tissues offer reliable absorbency, effectively tackling moisture and spills. Whether it's wiping away a runny nose or blotting away excess oil, these tissues quickly and efficiently absorb liquids, leaving the skin feeling clean and refreshed. Their absorbency contributes to their overall effectiveness in keeping you feeling comfortable and hygienic.4. Convenient Packaging: The packaging of these facial tissues is designed with convenience in mind. The tissues are neatly stacked and easily accessible, ensuring quick and hassle-free retrieval whenever needed. The packaging is also compact and portable, making it convenient to carry in a bag or keep within reach at home or on the go.5. Versatile and Multi-Purpose: These facial tissues are incredibly versatile and suitable for a range of uses. From personal care routines to household cleaning tasks, they serve multiple purposes effectively. They are equally handy for wiping hands, removing makeup, or cleaning surfaces. Their versatility makes them an essential item to have on hand for various everyday needs.In conclusion, these facial tissues have exceeded my expectations in terms of softness, strength, and reliability. With their gentle touch, exceptional durability, reliable absorbency, and convenient packaging, they offer a superior experience compared to standard tissues. I highly recommend them for anyone seeking top-quality facial tissues that provide comfort, convenience, and effectiveness. Invest in these amazing facial tissues and enjoy the difference they make in your daily routines!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tissue good, box not so much
reviews.reviewText: This is a great buy for the money. The tissues are soft enough. However, the box that each tissues are packed in is SO tight, that they come out ripped almost every time. I have to hold the top of the box with one hand and pull up a tissue with the other. As compared to other boxes where the tissue comes out easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These tissues are very soft and there are two tissues on each pull. They are thick enough that I separate them. They are a little messy with cotton dust if that is the right description however it is not enough to bother me having them on my desk and using them often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Priced well. Soft & sufficiently absorbant. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly Surprised by These!
reviews.reviewText: Typically I would only buy big brands like Puffs with Lotion for my nose because my skin always gets raw and scabbed when sick. My only issue with those brands is they tend to shed really bad. I wear glasses and they are always covered in little fuzz/lint from the tissue which drives me crazy. These are really nice because they don’t have that same shedding. They are soft and a good thickness. Really great for the price. The box design is subpar but if that’s how they save on costs I’m fine with it. First tissue ripped when taking it out but otherwise no issue with that. I’d recommend to friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They work just fine, however they aren’t the softest tissues. Additionally, they have a certain “cardboard” smell that isn’t necessarily horrible but not exactly pleasant.I do like the singular color boxes they come in. That influenced my decision a lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: These are great for the price, soft and absorbent. And fragrance free
